Control Name: 1.2.3 Install perimeter firewalls between all wireless networks and the cardholder data environment, and configure these firewalls to deny or, if traffic is necessary for business purposes, permit only authorized traffic between the wireless environment and the cardholder data environment.
Control Family: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems

control_attributes.Goals: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
control_attributes.Control: 1.2.3 Install perimeter firewalls between all wireless networks and the cardholder data environment, and configure these firewalls to deny or, if traffic is necessary for business purposes, permit only authorized traffic between the wireless environment and the cardholder data environment.
control_attributes.Requirement: 1. Install and maintain a firewall configuration to protect cardholder data
